## Restock Recommendation

| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000                                   |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock for 5 days of forecasted demand, accounting for potential demand variability. While current stock is ample for the next 5 days, purchasing 20,000 units will replenish stock before it reaches a dangerously low level and allow for multiple orders at the minimum discount threshold. |
